cab.content: (Thin Docwnjient is the Properly of-s""^ ......-:.......j-niy/s Government.) jT r*j i, ^^IjBATTLB SITUATION - NOON - 27th JULY, 1918,ti&inmStiSm FRONT.(a) French Front, Local actions only have taken place an the Battle frent.Between REIMS and the MARNE British Troops made a slight advance in the B01S DE COURTON. Further South the French have advanced to HILL 125 (South East of BINSON ORQUIGNY) and have occupied the MOULIN DU JOUR, South tfest of this place.The Germans continue to bombard the MARNE Valley and have destroyed a bridge at PASSY SUR MARNE.Between the MARNE and tho AISNE there is no change in the situation,(k) British Front. During the night we carried &ut raids In the neighbourhood of SAILLY LAURETTE, NEUVILLS VITASSE, ARLEUX EN GOHELLE and LENS, and brought back several prisoners.2. ITALIAN AND MACEDONIAN FRONTS, Thero is nothing to report,General Staff,War Office, SJ/.1. 27th July, 1918,Issued at 12c40 p,m.
